Sentence.sentence: Although many researchers broadly agree that public access to raw data would accelerate science, most are reluctant to post the results of their own labors online.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Although calls to share data often concentrate on the moral advantages of sharing, the practice is not purely altruistic ( ' , 利他的).
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A tax on upstream carbon sources is one easy way to put a price on carbon emissions, although some countries may wish to use other methods, such as emissions trading schemes.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Many even think their parents are cool! Although more than a third have an object in their rooms they would like to keep secret from their parents, rarely is it anything more alarming than a diary or offcolor ( ' ,  低俗的) book or CD.

Sentence.sentence: Although he says the worst is over, Baily says the banking crisis is not.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: While we argue phasing out racial terminology ( ' ,  术语 ) in the biological sciences, we also acknowledge that  using race as a political or social category to study racism, although filled with lots of challenges, remains necessary  given  our  need  to  understand  how  structural  inequities  and  discrimination  produce  health  disparities  ( ' ,  差异 )  between groups, Yudell said.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The Paris agreement has been widely hailed as a positive step forward in addressing climate change for all,  although the details on addressing climate justice can be best described as sketchy.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Shockingly, the two groups came up with plans of similar quality ( ' , although the college students had better spelling skills).
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But the Food and Drug Administration has not approved Avastin for use in the eye, and using it rather than the alternative, Lucentis, might carry an additional, although slight, safety risk.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Although going to college is supposed to be a full-time job, students spent.

Sentence.sentence: Although large companies could easily set up their own advertising departments, write their own advertisements andbuy media space themselves, they tend to use the services of largeadvertising agencies.

Sentence.sentence: Although a team may be composed of knowledgeable people, they must learn new ways of relating and working together to solve cross-functional problems.

Sentence.sentence: Although the application essay causes lots of anxiety, it does not play so important a role in the college's decision-making process.

Sentence.sentence: Although these educators may have good intentions,their advice to families is misguided, and it stemsfrom misunderstandings about the process of language acquisition
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Although surveys reveal the IDP process to be useful, trainees report a need for additional resources to help them identify a long-term career path and complete an IDP.

Sentence.sentence: Although that can indeed be frustrating, this is probably the only way to treat so grand a topic.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We think this is the way the future is going to work," said Kyle Dickson, co-director of research and the mobile learning initiative at Abilene Christian University in Texas, which has bought more than 600 iPhones and 300 iPods for students Although plenty of students take their laptops to class, they don't take them everywhere and would prefer something lighter
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Although most people admitted to some lingering rivalry, it was rarely strong enough to end the relationship.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It's rather remarkable for the fact that although it's extremely big, it's supported by just six rather slim legs.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And although she didn't have many symptoms, she knew it was just a matter of time
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Mandelbrot, who did the experiment with stock exchanges prices, for example, noted that although the outcomes were variable, there were in fact certain constancy
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: At Jackson's trial, although two witnesses testified that Jackson was with them in another location at the times of the crimes, he was convicted anyway.

Sentence.sentence: Although calls to share data often concentrate on the moral advantages of sharing, the practice is not purely altruistic.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Although going to college is supposed to be a full-time job, students spent, on average, only 12 to 14 hours a week studying and many were skating through their semesters without doing a significant amount of reading and writing.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Although many of the churches appear from the outside to be complex structures, they normally feature only a single storey but numerous different roof levels.

Sentence.sentence: Although many people say the new Barbies are a step in the right direction, some people say they don't go far enough.

Sentence.sentence: Although more than a third have an object in their rooms they would like to keep secret from their parents, rarely is it anything more alarming than a diary or off-color  低俗的 book or CD.

Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Saturated fats are fats that are found principally in meat and dairy products, although some nuts and vegetable oils also contain them.

Sentence.sentence: She stayed in the Northwest, although the test could not be more specific than somewhere between eastern Oregon and western Wyoming.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连词均可表示"虽然，尽管"之意。
means: though和although在意义上几乎毫无区别，但文体上后者是较正式用词，语气比though强。此外，在习惯用法上这两个词仍有以下一些差异：1.though可引出倒装语序的让步状语从句，although 则不能。2.though可与even连用，although则不能；在as though结构中，只用though，不能用although。3.though可以置于从句末，而although则不能。4.引出省略句时，通常用though。
as ： 引出让步状语从句只用于倒装语序结构中，语气强于上述两个连词。

stems_affixes.word_buile: al全部+most最多→adv.几乎, 差不多
al全部+ready准备→全部准备好了
al全部+so如此→全部如此→也,同样

stems_affixes.value_cn: 完全地, 总而言之;总之;总共
stems_affixes.word_buile: al全部+together共同, 一起→adv.完全地, 总而言之;总之;总共
al加强+though虽然→conj.虽然, 尽管

means.word_mean: 尽管, 虽然, 即使

sentences.en: Although my car is very old, it still runs very well.
sentences.cn: 我的汽车虽然很旧, 但仍然跑得很快。

sentences.en: Although they are poor they are happy.
sentences.cn: 虽然他们很穷, 但很快乐。

sentences.en: The high tax policy is certainly unpopular, although it's unlikely to meet the soaring armament expenditures.
sentences.cn: 高赋税政策肯定是不受欢迎的，但也未必能满足飞涨的军备开支。</seg>

expand_knowledge_list.en: 1.引导让步状语从句，尽管，虽然

entry.def: You use although to introduce a subordinate clause which contains a statement which contrasts with the statement in the main clause.

example.ex: Although he is known to only a few, his reputation among them is very great...
example.tran: 虽然知道他的人不多，但他在这些人中名声却很响。

example.ex: Although the shooting has stopped for now, the destruction left behind is enormous.
example.tran: 虽然枪战目前已停止，但造成的破坏是巨大的。

entry.def: You use although to introduce a subordinate clause which contains a statement which makes the main clause of the sentence seem surprising or unexpected.
entry.tran: 虽然（表示惊奇或出乎意料）

example.ex: Although I was only six, I can remember seeing it on TV...
example.tran: 虽然那时我只有6岁，我依然记得在电视上见过它。

example.ex: Although he was twice as old as us, he became the life and soul of the company.
example.tran: 虽然他的年纪是我们的两倍，但他却成为了公司的灵魂人物。

entry.def: You use although to introduce a subordinate clause which gives some information that is relevant to the main clause but modifies the strength of that statement.

example.ex: He was in love with her, although he did not put that name to it.
example.tran: 他爱着她，虽然他没有将其称为爱。

entry.def: You use although when admitting a fact about something which you regard as less important than a contrasting fact.
entry.tran: 尽管;虽然（表示承认所述是事实）

example.ex: Although they're expensive, they last forever and never go out of style...
example.tran: 尽管价格昂贵，但它们经久耐用，永不过时。

example.ex: Although not ideal, this attitude is not entirely destructive.
example.tran: 这种态度虽然不够理想，但还不至于消极透顶。

sentences.sentence: "even though she knew the answer, she did not respond"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from all(as an adverb) + though

sentences.cn: 尽管太阳高照，却不很暖和。
sentences.en: Although the sun was shining it wasn't very warm.

sentences.cn: 厨房虽小，但设计巧妙。
sentences.en: Although small, the kitchen is well designed.

sentences.cn: 我觉得他错了，不过我当时没有说出来。
sentences.en: I felt he was wrong, although I didn't say so at the time.

sentences.cn: 他爱着她，虽然他没有将其称为爱。
sentences.en: He was in love with her, although he did not put that name to it.

sentences.cn: 尽管价格昂贵，但它们经久耐用，永不过时。
sentences.en: Although they're expensive, they last forever and never go out of style...

sentences.cn: 这种态度虽然不够理想，但还不至于消极透顶。
sentences.en: Although not ideal, this attitude is not entirely destructive.

sentences.cn: 虽然知道他的人不多，但他在这些人中名声却很响。
sentences.en: Although he is known to only a few, his reputation among them is very great...

sentences.cn: 虽然枪战目前已停止，但造成的破坏是巨大的。
sentences.en: Although the shooting has stopped for now, the destruction left behind is enormous.

sentences.cn: 虽然那时我只有6岁，我依然记得在电视上见过它。
sentences.en: Although I was only six, I can remember seeing it on TV...

sentences.cn: 虽然他的年纪是我们的两倍，但他却成为了公司的灵魂人物。
sentences.en: Although he was twice as old as us, he became the life and soul of the company.

sentences.cn: 尽管两国公开表示和平共处, 但战斗还在继续.
sentences.en: Although the two countries were officially at peace, fighting continued.

sentences.cn: 她虽然觉得身体不舒服, 但仍然去上班了.
sentences.en: Although she felt ill, she still went to work.

sentences.cn: 高赋税政策肯定是不受欢迎的, 但也未必能满足飞涨的军备开支.
sentences.en: The high tax policy is certainly unpopular, although it's unlikely to meet the soaring armament expenditures.

sentences.cn: 虽然这翻译并不尽善尽美, 但他已尽力而为了.
sentences.en: Although the translation is not perfect, he did it to the best of his ability.

sentences.cn: 虽然很晚了, 但还有足够的时间去赴这个约会.
sentences.en: Although it was late, there was still enough time to keep the rendezvous.

sentences.cn: 尽管比尔被警察监禁过, 但他现在驾驶运货车,用正当的手段挣钱.
sentences.en: Although Bill has been in trouble with the police, he earns an honest penny these days by driving a van.

sentences.cn: 难民们虽然已经到了安全地带,但还是战战兢兢的.
sentences.en: The refugees are still jumpy, although they are now in safety.

sentences.cn: 尽管我竭力地讲, 起初卢瑟就是听不进去.
sentences.en: Although I tried, at first Luther would not hear to it.

sentences.cn: 尽管那只母狮是猎食其他动物的凶残的野兽, 但它同自己的幼崽玩耍时却非常温顺.
sentences.en: Although a vicious hunter, the lioness was as gentle as a dove when playing with her cubs.

sentences.cn: 虽然我们萍水相逢, 可是我觉得你是个了不起的有志气的姑娘.
sentences.en: Although we have only met by chance , I can see you are a very remarkable girl with a clear purpose in life.

sentences.cn: 虽然他年岁已大, 但他还能像往常一样努力工作.
sentences.en: Although he is getting along in years, he can work hard as usual.

sentences.cn: 虽然那张床被撞成碎片, 但是那个人却奇迹般地没有受伤.
sentences.en: Although the bed was smashed to pieces, the man was miraculously unhurt.

sentences.cn: 虽然黑人学生与白人学生之间没有公开的敌意，但他们也不怎么来往。
sentences.en: Although there is no overt hostility, black and white students do not mix much.

sentences.cn: 这个男子让人感到有些熟悉，但是希尔斯滕一时认不出他是谁。
sentences.en: Something about the man was familiar, although Hillsden could not immediately place him.

sentences.cn: 虽然是在自己家乡，他的竞选活动还是因私通指控受到了冲击。
sentences.en: Although he was on home ground, his campaign had been rocked by adultery allegations.

sentences.cn: 尽管太阳高照，却不很暖和。
sentences.en: Although the sun was shining it wasn't very warm.

sentences.cn: 尽管价格昂贵，但它们经久耐用，永不过时。
sentences.en: Although they're expensive, they last forever and never go out of style...

sentences.cn: 尽管伤心也会先于眼泪产生，但有证据表明，情绪变化可能是由肌肉反应引起的。
sentences.en: Although sadness also precedes tears, evidence suggests that emotions can flow from muscular responses.

sentences.cn: 收到“不跟踪”信号不能迫使企业停止跟踪，尽管有些公司承诺会这么做。
sentences.en: Getting a DNT signal does not oblige anyone to stop tracking, although some companies have promised to do so.

sentences.cn: 尽管这些都为他的小说奠定了潜在性基础，但他甚至都没有向他的妻子坦白这一切。
sentences.en: He could not confide them even to his wife, although they provide the unacknowledged foundation of his fiction.

sentences.cn: 这段情节证明了一种具有讽刺意味的现象确实存在:尽管美国男性倾向于在公共场合比女性健谈，在家里却比妻子话少。而正是这种模式正在严重威胁婚姻。
sentences.en: This episode crystallizes the irony that although American men tend to talk more than women in public situations they often talk less at home.

sentences.cn: 尽管电子支付手段可能会比纸币付款系统更为高效，但是一些因素却阻止了纸币付款系统的消失。
sentences.en: Although electronic means of payment may be more efficient than a payments system based on paper, several factors work against the disappearance of the paper system.

sentences.cn: 尽管科技可能改变我们的反应方式，但它还没有改变我们的天性。
sentences.en: Although technology might change the way we react, it hasn’t changed our nature.

sentences.cn: 尽管现在道路行驶中电动汽车依然鲜见，但是这笔巨额投资可能会在未来几年迅速改变，这一局面。
sentences.en: Although electric cars are still a rarity on roads now, this massive investment could change the picture rapidly in coming years.

sentences.cn: 那次有13个人受伤, 然而没人像霍尔茨受伤那么严重.

sentences.cn: 然而,他们的婚姻虽然在双方忠贞的感情下没有破裂,却也并不见得有多幸福.
sentences.en: The marriage proved less than blissful, although it was saved by dogged loyalty on both sides.

sentences.cn: 然而,大学生的职业价值取向尽管具有积极因素, 但还缺乏理性维度,还存在一些不良倾向.
sentences.en: Although the orientation contains positive factors, it also lacks rational dimension and has some undesirable tendency.

sentences.cn: 然而,阴郁 、 粗鲁的罗切斯特尽管疼痛难忍,却执意不让别人搀扶,要自行回到家里去.
sentences.en: But the gruff, burly Rochester insists on getting home unaided although he is in great pain.

sentences.cn: 虽然手与脚都是业绩显赫, 然而, 其待遇却大不相同.
sentences.en: Although hand and foot are outstanding achievement celebrated, however, its pay is very different however.

sentences.cn: 然而, 尽管目的值得称道, 她的方法却是令人置疑的.
sentences.en: Yet, although the ends are laudable, her means are questionable.

sentences.cn: 虽然有些人对之不屑一顾, 然而这一理念确实广受欢迎.
sentences.en: Although some may scoff, it has been a remarkably compelling vision.

sentences.cn: 然而, 她实现了在世界上没有什么,但她已投身于它.
sentences.en: However, she achieves nothing in the world although she has devoted herself to it.

sentences.cn: 然而, 尽管我们的批评必然会强调负面的影响, 但其动机却是良好的.
sentences.en: Yet, although our criticisms must occasionally stress the negative, their intent is positive.

sentences.cn: 然而,在网络广告强势发展的同时, 相伴而来的是一系列新型的问题.
sentences.en: Although the web advertisement develops rapidly, there are a series of new problems meanwhile.

sentences.cn: 虽然这时候众人都怀着紧张的心情无心注意到景色上面,然而园里的一花一草,一木一石,都 显然 地立在那里,逃不过众人的眼睛.
sentences.en: Although people were overwrought, they could not help noticing these beauties of nature.

sentences.cn: 尽管埃及人很好战, 然而他们发现这项有利于和平的运动.
sentences.en: Although the Egyptians were warlike, they found times for peaceful games.

sentences.cn: 过去虽然打过胜仗, 然而现在不是已经和过去不同了 吗 ?
sentences.en: Although battles had been won in this way , was not the situation different now?

sentences.cn: 尽管有些企业乐于让西班牙游说议员当他们的代表, 然而其他人很不情愿为自己的国家战斗.
sentences.en: Although some companies to let Spain lobby on their behalf, others are to fly the flag.

sentences.cn: 然而,尽管她表示女性担任院长颇为流行,但同时确信,一种更为协作的风格同样重要.
sentences.en: But although she says the appointment of women deans collaborative style is a lso important.

sentences.cn: 虽然人们生来要成功,然而, 他们同样生来就是无助的,完全依靠环境.
sentences.en: Although people born to win, they are also born helpless and totally dependent on their environment.

sentences.cn: 然而,在印度尼西亚的通用汽车销量却增长了将近20%.
sentences.en: Although are were up in Indonisia Indonesia by nearly 20 %.

sentences.cn: 然而尽管这些方法带来了有效的交互, 它们还仅仅是一个开始.
sentences.en: However, although these solutions certainly point to effective interactions, they are just a start.

sentences.cn: 他感到舒服,但也很痛苦, 然而他根本不承认是痛苦.
sentences.en: He was comfortable but suffering, although he did not admit the suffering at all.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 老人与海

sentences.cn: 虽是同样的情况, 然而不同的意念, 就会产生不同的态度.
sentences.en: Although it is the same situation , different ideas, however, will have different attitudes.

sentences.cn: 然而, 孔雀虽有毒, 不可废文章.
sentences.en: However, the peacock although is virulent , cannot abandon the article.

sentences.cn: 等距型面轴联结具有很多优越性,然而对等距型面轴的加工一直困扰着我们.
sentences.en: Although there are many superiorities in isometric profile connection , machining isometric profile shaft annoys us.

sentences.cn: 然而,即使这些软件工作地非常出色,但是从图象到视频仍然有一些问题.
sentences.en: Although these packages produce excellent results there are problems transferring the images to video.

sentences.cn: 然而, 尽管需要客户的认可,但是, 这个客户既没有承认也没有说是否接受这项可交付成果.
sentences.en: However, the customer neither acknowledges the deliverable nor says is acceptable, although an approval is requireD.

sentences.cn: 尽管我们未能充分发掘潜力, 然而,整个经济生活仍在发展 、 在变革 、 在进步.
sentences.en: Although full potential was not achieved, growth, change, and progress permeated economic life.

sentences.cn: 虽然她承认害怕俄国人, 然而她似乎对菲尔比本人有一种矛盾的感情.
sentences.en: Although she professed fear of the Russians, she seemed to have ambivalent feelings toward Philby himself.
